Contributor: Forain, Jean-Louis, 1852-1931, artist.; H. Chachoin, printer.;
Note: Signed "Forain." Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Visa No. 16.424" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French says that the Secretary of State of Demobilization asks the industrial and agricultural busineses to employ the former soldiers. Illustration shows a sketch of a serviceman and his small son.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
